snippet: Donald J. Trump told the New England Police Benevolent Association that as president he would sign an executive order mandating the death penalty for anyone convicted of killing a police officer.
abstract: Donald J. Trump told the New England Police Benevolent Association that as president he would sign an executive order mandating the death penalty for anyone convicted of killing a police officer.
